moves.desc: Has a 100% chance to raise the user's Speed by 1 stage.

moves.name: Flame Charge

moves.desc: Power is equal to the greater of (user's Happiness * 2/5), rounded down, or 1.
moves.name: Return

moves.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1.

moves.desc: Lowers the target's Defense by 1 stage.

ability.name: Blaze
ability.shortDesc: At 1/3 or less of its max HP, this Pokemon's attacking stat is 1.5x with Fire attacks.

moves.desc: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, it steals the target's held : stat if it is holding one and eats it immediately, gaining its effects even if the user's stat is being ignored. stats lost to this move cannot be regained with Recycle or the Harvest Ability.
moves.shortDesc: User steals and eats the target's : stat.
moves.name: Bug Bite

moves.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the foe(s) Speed by 1.
moves.name: Electroweb

moves.desc: Raises the user's Defense by 2 stages.
moves.name: Iron Defense

ability.name: Shed Skin
ability.shortDesc: This Pokemon has a 33% chance to have its status cured at the begin of each turn.

moves.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.
moves.shortDesc: High critical hit ratio. Hits adjacent foes.
moves.name: Razor Leaf

moves.desc: Has a 20% chance to flinch the target.
moves.name: Zen Headbutt

moves.desc: The user is protected from most attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Obstruct, Protect, Quick Guard, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn.
moves.shortDesc: Prevents moves from affecting the user this turn.
moves.name: Protect

moves.desc: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Sunny Day. The damage of Fire-type attacks is multiplied by 1.5 and the damage of Water-type attacks is multiplied by 0.5 during the effect. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Heat Rock. Fails if the current weather is Sunny Day.
moves.shortDesc: For 5 turns, intense sunlight powers Fire moves.
moves.name: Sunny Day

ability.name: Oblivious
ability.shortDesc: This Pokemon cannot be infatuated or confusion. Immune to Intimidate.
